text: Father of a Soldier () is a 1964 Soviet drama movie directed by Rezo Chkheidze.Тимур Бекмамбетов: патриотизм рождается из верности своему слову и преданности друзьямОТЕЦ СОЛДАТА (1964) It stars Sergo Zaqariadze, Vladimir Privaltsev, and Aleksandr Nazarov. ==Actors== * Sergo Zaqariadze as Giorgi Makharashvili * Vladimir Privaltsev as Nikiforov * Aleksandr Nazarov as Arkadi * Aleksandr Lebedev as Nikolay Nazarov * Yuri Drozdov as Vova * Vladimir Kolokoltsev as Grisha * Viktor Uralsky as Pasha == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet war movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:1964 war movies Category:Russian war movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Georgian movies Category:Movies directed by Revaz Chkheidze Category:Movies about Nazi Germany Category:World War II movies
title: Father of a Soldier
